Articles.Content:
I posted this in the wrong place

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-03T00:33:35Z" title="03/03/2015 12:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 3, 2015</time> by Apature rocket science**

Actually we do, the radius is in the[**Wiki**](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerbin) and is 600km.

So the circumference is 1885km ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Actually we do, the radius is in the[**Wiki**](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerbin) and is 600km.
> So the circumference is 1885km ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

^3770. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

 Although I flew a circumnavigation flight this weekend and my distance was over 4200 km, so maybe there's something to it...

Best,

-Slashy
